top_comments.comment: Harry's is more of like telling to himself and Jungkook's is like he is saying to someone desperately. Jungkook's raw emotions is working more intimately with the storytelling of the song. Also, after this cover i'm convinced that Jungkook is the best storyteller singer we have in our era. This man is insane🔥

Jungkook has been shining as the main vocalist of BTS for over 8 years now. He has gained so much experience and shown enormous growth. I really can’t wait for him to release his solo mixtape and unlock his full potential!

I love the kitten. He is so adorable.
Jungkook did Harry's song justice definitely.
I have loved this song song it came out. Jungkook nailed this.

I sees others commenting on the kitten,  but once the music started, I only saw your facial expressions totally immersed in the music.  

I will now have to watch it a second time to see what Motley was doing!!
I love your reaction, JK is unbelievable.  His voice in this cover moves me so much!

comments_since_last_sample.body: ur kitten is army now
Blake—I love watching your reaction videos—and knew something would pop up from you regarding JK’s cover.  I agree with every comment you made 💟
Thank you for explaining the singing and production techniques!  And so fun to see you spontaneously sing along — when you can’t help singing, you know it’s a great song. 🎤🎶
It’s more polished
I was hoping you would do a reaction since I know you are a fan of Harry. I'm glad you liked it. Thank you! 💜

Blake, thank you for your reaction. You're the first reactor I came across that did a comparison between JK's version and Harry's. I appreciate your knowledge and insight. I've been watching your reactions to BTS for a while now and just realized I hadn't subscribed yet. Subscribe button has now been smashed! 

Motley is adorable! Can't wait to see more of him!
